name: 3 Clues 1 Answer
description:
Yellow, Sour, Citrus...could the answer be Lemon?

Pyramid, Sphynx, Cairo...could the answer be Egypt?

3 Clues, 1 Answer is a brand new word game that's fun and addicting. With 3 Clues, it'll be up to you figure our the link between them to solve the answer. It's starts out easy, but it gets harder along the way!

If you need help along the way, you can Zap your letters to remove extra ones or you can get a Hint for the answer.

With over 350 puzzles, there's plenty of fun packed away in 3 Clues, 1 Answer. There's no time limits, no nagging advertisements, only some addicting word game fun. Download and play today!
